I love this game, a lot of hours have been put into this game. I always recommend people to try it, however, there are some flaws that need to be addressed. The game is simply bad at giving new players instructions on how to play. I appreciate how they redid the tutorial but there's more to it then just that. It should mention obsessions, perks, and overall how people should play. Solo queue is horrid due to the lack of information and comms. It's already been addressed but as of now it's a pain trying to live. Perk balance is something that is bad on both sides. Boon: Circle of Healing is simply OP in it's current state and it being essentially a unlimited hex while actual hexes can get cleaned within the first minute of the game. Killers on the other hand have perks that are way too under powered to be viable, the mindset seems to be that perks always come out safe and then down the line 1-2 years later revised, even then there needs to be more. The grind is always pretty bad. Perks have grown significantly and if you want to get one onto your perk selection, it could take a million bloodpoints and even then you might not have it still. Tiers are another factor. Besides that, Dead By Daylight is an amazing game that can get pretty competitive on both sides. It's fun to learn killers and to 4K, and to learn how to loop and escape after a hard fought match. The maps can be rough, but very detailed. The lore BHVR has put in is awesome and the archive videos are awesome as well. The licenses are amazing and really add onto this game. It's hard at first learning everything, but once you start to get the hang of it it can be one of the best games you've ever played.

DEAD BY DAYLIGHT IS TRASH

Let me start off by saying this the only reason why I bought this game was because of content creators on tiktok. it looked fun and I always found cat and mouse type games interesting but everyday I play this god forsaken game I’m starting to realize the community & devs are full of ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ and immature toxic hoes (noting wrong with being toxic it’s just when you act like a hoe it’s a problem).

I’ve been playing for a total of 3 months I got the game in August and I’m already in “red ranks” in October the matchmaking needs to be fix I was a beginner facing purple, gold and red killers and I was just ash and bronze I don’t know if it had to do with skill or not it just took me a day to figure out the concept of the game and a week for me to memorize some of the maps but yeah the matchmaking is all over the place and the queue time take up to 3 to 5 mins just to find a game and while that happening I’m just browsing tiktok and insta just to past the time.

Don’t get me started on the brain dead console ♥♥♥♥♥ including the failed twitch streams how do they expect me to have more blood points when I’m doing all the gens by myself and they dont know how to loop or do a gen without missing a skill check I have multiple videos of low ranks while I’m in red thinking their good because they have more BP the only reason they have it is because I don’t spend my time unhooking them I do gens because they not gonna do it and yes I’m toxic because I hate playing with dumb asses I feel like it would be better if the devs were to add voice chat but based on what they say on Twitter they don’t plan to. The game needs new modes and a reason to keep playing skins and battle passes aren’t content they also have a over saturation of both killer and survivors also this game is “pay to win” if you can’t afford getting new killers or survivors I would avoid this game most of the perks feel useless and the ones that are good are only attainable by grinding specific Characters to make it a teachable perks or grinding the game a whole week just to get a total of 2000 in game currency which you can not buy with real world money to get teachable perks out the shop (they last for a total of 7days and after that they recycle to new ones.

For the record, this is probably the only online multiplayer game I've put this many hours into and I'm confident in my statement that there's really no competition on the market for DBD because it just totally dominates the field of asymmetrical horror. Yes, it can be a money-sucker if you want all the killers/survivors, you want cute cosmetics, or you just generally feel like buying every single rift (battle pass, basically.) All of these totally optional, but I will admit that I have been found guilty of multiple of those offenses. It's an engaging game that somehow stays interesting despite the fact that every single match is pretty much the same thing over and over... but different somehow. Play-styles always differ from every opposition and it truly is a game of adaptation. I do want the developers to stop pumping out nonstop DLC characters and outfits to instead hunker down on bugs and overall frustrating or boring game mechanics, but I guess beggars can't always be choosers. Especially if I simply continue to empty my pockets for them.

Игра нет то есть кусок говна извеняюсь за выражения идет как и положено по своему пути то есть на дно. Как такогого баланса нету и не будет в каждой игре либо пати по связи с топ перками и ты сосешь или рандомные сурвы выше тебя по рангу и опыту игры у которых топ перки и ты снова сосешь когда у тебя мана какие то простые стандартные перки которые почти всегда не имеют смыла в матче. При выходе с игры дают бан но как то рандомно то дадут то нет. Все еще сервера лагают играешь за мана проходишь в метре от палетки всеравно ловишь стан за сурва так вообще пробивают через все что только можно. После последнего обновления даещь хит сурву перед тем как он скидывает палетку ЗВУК ХИТА СЛЫШЕН И ВИДЕН НО ХИТ НЕ ПРОХОДИТ. Жалею что отдал за это деньги даже по скидке просто минус нервы и деньги.

Despite 500 hours and numerous occasions of frustration, and a large amount of fist clenching moments, there isn't much wrong with the game. The developers do a fine a job of balancing, all the while having limited time to push out updates to appease the ever-hungry toxic community. Speaking of which, the community of this game is incredibly harsh towards the developers, but take little time to appreciate how hard a game like this is to code and make properly (which they've done a pretty fine job at imo). I think if everyone stopped pretending they are entitled to the game going their way, and appreciated what the developers have wrestled with for over 5 years now, things might be a little different.

I love this game, but they're starting to veer into lefty politics... I play games to get away from all that nonsense, I don't need to see a rainbow flag on every screen and every other player. Its just too much, games should be apolitical escapes from the world, not clubs to beat cultural dominance into people with. If I wanted to play politics I'd go to my state's capitol, I just want to chase people and run away without the non-stop political propaganda.
